ygData.subject: Re: Commander Speaks!
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Prowl frowns as he feels her mixed beast mode grumbling in her mind. He smiles as he hears its question to him. Iron Raptor could be a bitch, yes, but he

::Prowl::

Prowl frowns as he feels her mixed beast mode grumbling in her mind. 
He smiles as he hears its question to him. Iron Raptor could be a 
bitch, yes, but he loved her and didn't really mind.

He jerks his eyes off her hair as it is waved in the wind, knowing 
that he'd be no good in a fight if all he could do is stare at her. 
His mind agreed to her frustration for the Maximals.

Prowl grinns as he hears her words to the Maximals. She sounded just 
like a commander ... and she was hot too! Prowl grinns at Iron 
Raptor, making sure that she could hear that thought. His wings get 
ready to fly, his boosters powering up.

-They'll certainly be surprised!- he thinks to her, a sudden thought 
occuring to him -Hey, do you know how to fly or should I fly you back 
to base?-

The Maximal was hoping she'd need him to fly her, thought he tried 
not to think that. Any chance at holding her was welcome, and he knew 
that this new body could easily take the trip and carry a bot at the 
same time.



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "Megan Solmonson" <tmrattrap@h...> wrote:
> 
> 
> 
> 
> * Iron Raptor keeps her eyes on the new bot, wondering if he was 
ever going 
> to respond. But she doubted it.
> She rolls her eyes as she gets Prowls thoughts, not his reply. But 
the ones 
> which he had looked over her body before she had transformed.
> Men!  ;)
> 
> But the beast in her mind almost seemed to urge her on, wanting her 
to make 
> the first move instead of talking this out.
> Though, she simply brushed it aside as easily as an after thought, 
the beast 
> obviously offended but still there.
> Her mind snapping out at it: " This is MY mind now and if you don't 
like it 
> you can gladly leave. You won't be missed!"
> The creature simply gave her a look as if it were calling her a 
bitch right 
> out, then settled down.
> But then the creature turnes on Prowls thoughts as they filter into 
Iron 
> Raptors mind, basically growling at him and asking him how he could 
put up 
> with her.
> 
> Iron Raptor simply ignores the creature, turning her attention 
towards 
> Shadow again, the wind picking up and making the cape shift and 
blow around 
> her. Her hair shifting about her head as the sun grew higher in the 
sky.
> Suddenly hearing Klusters transmission in her head, wondering just 
how many 
> times he had broudcasted this until she heard the word three.
> THREE! And the Maximals still weren't there yet!?
> This was the first time that she had heard this, so at least she 
had an 
> excuse. But the others.
> Iron Raptor sighed.
> Enough with this Shadow...she had Maximals to rally!
> 
> Iron Raptor looked towards Prowl as he contacted her through his 
mind, still 
> finding this all so new. Thinking how all of this had happened so 
quickly.
> Slumping slightly in her armor.*
> 
> < Yeah. I heard. Boy! Is everyone in for a few 
surprises...providing that 
> they ever get to base.>
> 
> * But then she, somehow, found the command to her new com-link and 
opened it 
> to all the Maximal frequencies. Making her voice very clear and 
with 
> command.*
> 
> " All Maximals, this is Iron Raptor. You've all already been given 
the 
> command to return to base. Respond to it. There is no excuse 
acceptable for 
> not doing so unless there is battle or you can give me a better one.
> Now, please return to base!"
> 
> * Iron Raptor then deactivated the comm and looked at Prowl.*
> 
> < Let's get going.>
> 
>
